TypeSignature.Value: Public Class TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder(Of TProperty) Inherits TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder

Docs.summary: Provides a simple API surface for setting property defaults before conventions run.

remarks.para: Instances of this class are returned from methods when using the API and it is not designed to be directly constructed in your application code.
See Modeling entity types and relationships for more information and examples.

Docs.summary: This is an internal API that supports the Entity Framework Core infrastructure and not subject to the same compatibility standards as public APIs. It may be changed or removed without notice in any release. You should only use it directly in your code with extreme caution and knowing that doing so can result in application failures when updating to a new Entity Framework Core release.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder<TProperty> HasAnnotation (string annotation, object value);

Public Overridable Function HasAnnotation (annotation As String, value As Object) As TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder(Of TProperty)
override this.HasAnnotation : string * obj -> Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder<'Property>

Docs.param: The key of the annotation to be added or updated.
The value to be stored in the annotation.
Docs.summary: Adds or updates an annotation on the property. If an annotation with the key specified in already exists its value will be updated.
Docs.returns: The same builder instance so that multiple configuration calls can be chained.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder<TProperty> HasMaxLength (int maxLength);

Public Overridable Function HasMaxLength (maxLength As Integer) As TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder(Of TProperty)
override this.HasMaxLength : int -> Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder<'Property>

Docs.param: The maximum length of data allowed in the property. A value of -1 indicates that the property has no maximum length.
Docs.summary: Configures the maximum length of data that can be stored in this property. Maximum length can only be set on array properties (including properties).
Docs.returns: The same builder instance so that multiple configuration calls can be chained.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder<TProperty> HasSentinel (object? sentinel);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder`1<!TProperty> HasSentinel(object sentinel) cil managed
Public Overridable Function HasSentinel (sentinel As Object) As TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder(Of TProperty)
override this.HasSentinel : obj -> Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.TypeMappingConfigurationBuilder<'Property>

Docs.summary: Configures the value that will be used to determine if the property has been set or not. If the property is set to the sentinel value, then it is considered not set. By default, the sentinel value is the CLR default value for the type of the property.
Docs.returns: The same builder instance if the configuration was applied, otherwise.

Docs.summary: Configures the value that will be used to determine if the property has been set or not. If the property is set to the sentinel value, then it is considered not set. By default, the sentinel value is the CLR default value for the type of the property.
Docs.returns: The same builder instance if the configuration was applied, otherwise.

Docs.param: A value indicating whether the property can contain unicode characters.
Docs.summary: Configures the property as capable of persisting unicode characters. Can only be set on properties.
Docs.returns: The same builder instance so that multiple configuration calls can be chained.
